taskDescription: In step 2 of the citric acid cycle (Figure 29.14), cis-aconitate reacts with water to give (2R,3S)-isocitrate. Does  –OH add from the Re face of the double bond or from the Si face? What about  –H? Does the addition of water occur with syn or anti geometry?
